alert.note: Alert for Caldwell; Crittenden; Livingston; Lyon; Marshall (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 13 at 5:53PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Livingston, central Crittenden, northwestern Caldwell, north central Marshall and northwestern Lyon Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 453 PM CDT, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Calvert City, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters in Reidland. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Marion and Farmersville around 510 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Creswell. This includes Interstate 24 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 28 and 38. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for western and northwestern Kentucky.
